content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(0.0, 0.0) with fuel={'coal': 42}, direction=Direction.UP, energy=1600.0, and status=EntityStatus.WORKING.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to place an entity before placing it.
### Errors when placing entities without required items in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to place an entity.
### Errors when inserting items into entities without required items in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity.
### Errors when placing transport belts without specifying a valid direction
- Ensure you specify a valid direction when placing a transport belt.
### Errors when placing entities in occupied tiles
- Ensure the target tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.
